ks like an argument is directed at me. ;)

                  any co=
nclusions, so I plan more experiments.=C2=A0 Since there 
                 =
 are different distinct claims about what the box or the 
                 =
 recorders can do, I try to make different distinct experiments 
          =
        for each.

Some people claim they can get the box to 
             =
     tell them things that the operator couldn't know, so my "whats 
      =
            the object" experiment is one way to examine that.=C2=A0 Some 
=
                  people claim the boxes can make predictions, so catalogin=
g 
                  predictions and examining the results can help examine=
 
                  that.=C2=A0 If there are other claims, I will try to fi=
gure 
                  experiments based on those.

nto the basement wiht the

ttle yorkie barked, but "get 
                    outta here" came out, som=
e how. 
                    =C2=A0
                    =C2=A0Yeah, I think =
I was too hard on RJ. I don't know

ens't seem to work, but we get enough to

not religious, even anti-religion.=C2=A0
